docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of pharmacists ended their two-day boycott of Medicaid prescriptions yesterday, after the city promised twice-monthly payments to end delays in reimbursements.

headline.main: Druggists End Boycott Of Medicaid After Pact

docs.snippet: Hundreds of pharmacists ended their two-day boycott of Medicaid prescriptions yesterday, after the city promised twice-monthly payments to end delays in reimbursements.

docs.lead_paragraph: The city Health Department said yesterday that the threatened boycott by pharmacists of the Medicaid program appeared to be ineffective so far. far.
docs.abstract: boycott begins; effects; O'Rourke calls boycott ineffective

docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, -- "The real question,'' the doctor said after prescribing heroin for a young commercial artist, "is whether we are about to develop in this country an American-type black market in narcotics."

headline.main: Narcotics; New Approach to Addicts in Britain
